summary: Fernandez is a lonely man leading a lonely life. All he does is work for an old man in a hardware store. But all that changes, when he meets the girl of his dreams...and her family.
cast: Walter Vidarte|Graciela Borges|Nora Cullen|Fernando Iglesias 'Tacholas'|Martín Andrade|José E. Felicetti|Linda Peretz|Leonardo Favio|Edgardo Suárez
title: El dependiente
